Store name: Blind Fish, they guy and gal playing darts

David

----- Original Message -----
From: John Danielson <clu@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, April 30, 1999 5:56 AM
Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Re: Ore in the world


From: John Danielson <clu@...>

At 07:10 4/30/99 GMT, you wrote:
>From: mirth2@... (Andrew Wood)
>
>On Thu, 29 Apr 1999 18:33:18 EDT, you wrote:
>
>
>I just started smithing in Neriak.. I have found books and molds where
>can you find stones and ore?

I was just about to ask the same thing, I think I was in every store in
Neriak exploring with my first dark elf, and I don't remember seeing any
ore...

>
>>From: XxKommiexX@...
>>
>>Also in Neriak. You can buy unlimites sharpening stones and ore.
